channel.title: Home on Gerry Tonkin-Hill
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Gerry Tonkin-Hill

item.title: Hugo-Tufte Features
item.description:
This is a quick demonstration post. It serves as an example of the features of this theme. One of them is \( \LaTeX \) via MathJax.

A Bit About Mathematics

item.title: Hide Date
item.description: Here is an example post where the date set, but hidden from display. Moreover, the reading time is also hidden.

item.title: About
item.description: Employment Postdoctoral Research Fellow, University of Oslo Undergraduate Tutor, University of Cambridge Research Assistant, Walter and Eliza Hall Institute Optimisation Consultant, Biarri Commercial Mathematics Undergraduate Tutor, University of Melbourne Education PhD Mathematical Genomics, University of Cambridge & Wellcome Sanger Institute MSc Probability and Statistics, University of Melbourne BSc Applied Mathematics, University of Melbourne

item.title: Publications
item.description: This list is updated occasionally. A full list can be found on Google Scholar or Orcid. * = joint authorship Publications 2021 Horesh, Gal, Grace A. Blackwell, Gerry Tonkin-Hill, Jukka Corander, Eva Heinz, and Nicholas R. Thomson. 2021. “A Comprehensive and High-Quality Collection of Escherichia Coli Genomes and Their Genes.” Microbial Genomics, January. https://doi.org/10.1099/mgen.0.000499. 2020 Tonkin-Hill, Gerry*, Inigo Martincorena*, Roberto Amato, Andrew R. J. Lawson, Moritz Gerstung, Ian Johnston, David K.

item.title: Software
item.description: Up to date code and documentation for my software can be found on GitHub. Software panaroo An error aware pipeline for pangenome investigation fastbaps A fast approximation to a Dirichlet Process Mixture model (DPM) for clustering genetic data pairsnp A set of scripts for very quickly obtaining pairwise SNP distance matrices from multiple sequence alignments using sparse matrix libraries to improve performance. rhierbaps R package implementing the hierBAPS algorithm. starmie R package developed with Stuart Lee to make post processing of population structure software output easier.
